page.title: 13HOME LIFE
page.content: Typically a child might wake at around seven o'clock,dress and have breakfast and get ready to go to school which normally begins at 0900 The day at school would begin with the register being called and then an assembly in the hall taken by a teacher or sometimes the children themselves.The morning might be spent doing some maths and english work and there would be a break of fifteen minutes for play.Lunch would be taken between 1200 and 1315 some children eating a school lunch cooked in the kitchen whilst others might choose to bring a packed lunch from home.The afternoon session would again begin with a register after which topic work or art and craft work would be done.at some point in the week the class would have games and also some time in the hall for P.E. or drama or dance.
